issue.title: world frame does not go with tf across network

content.raw: @nkoenig, yeah I thought 'world' probably wouldn't be available since we could then just lookup some nice transformations...  Will there be another example walking script created that will work without the 'world' frame?  It would be nice to not have to recreate the walking ourselves :)
content.html: @nkoenig, yeah I thought 'world' probably wouldn't be available since we could then just lookup some nice transformations... Will there be another example walking script created that will work without the 'world' frame? It would be nice to not have to recreate the walking ourselves :)
